abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bid $1.7 billion in cash for reinsurer IPC Holdings before that company opted to sell itself to Validus instead, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bid $1.7 billion in cash for reinsurer IPC Holdings before that company opted to sell itself to Validus instead, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: When Validus Holdings recently laid out the history of its deal to buy IPC Holdings in a regulatory filing, it alluded to some rival bidders, including a mysterious “Party M.”

headline.main: Buffett’s Insurance Deal That Got Away
